Title: Actual Physical Violence
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Eduardo Javier Canto, Ryan Maldonado, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: A disgruntled father takes a member of Intelligence hostage in order to force the police to track down his missing daughter.
